data.content:
Today, we unveil the first image from all four of our @ESA_EO EarthCARE mission instruments at  #IAC2024.

These new results clearly highlight how these four advanced sensors work in synergy to measure exactly how clouds and aerosols influence the heating and cooling of our https://t.co/LgdPMefkEq

Its day 3 at #IAC2024!

Expect another day packed with a series of high-profile sessions featuring key figures from the European Space Agency, including ESA Director General Josef Aschbacher and ESA Directors.

 Full programme  https://t.co/j24UXsuhAs

Take a look back at https://t.co/vgPWn5hYhC
JAXA is participating #IAC2024! On Day 3, well have 4 lectures regarding JAXA missions and presentations by private companies. https://t.co/dQ0uqr5T6l

The CSA announces contract award to Canadian company @KeplerComms for high-profile European space project. This funding is made possible by Canadas longstanding cooperation agreement with @esa. Other companies receiving funding include @ccore1975, @ABBgroupnews and @sbquantum. https://t.co/J0XI8ojN7v

We have a new education channel on YouTube! 

@ESA__Education offers a thrilling mix of content like:
  
 Hands-on experiments and how-to demos.
 Engaging explainers on space science, technology and engineering  .
 Inspiring vlogs and documentaries about https://t.co/9eAZJIYApO

Lagrange Points are five areas in space where the gravitational forces of a two-body system produce enhanced regions of attraction and repulsion. 
 
The James Webb Space Telescope now orbits the Sun around L2, located 1.5 million kilometres from Earth.

 NASA/WMAP https://t.co/WM4q5YEJU5

Welcome to #IAC2024 day 2! 

We are gearing up for another day packed with major announcements, contract signings and expert panels to showcase Europes leadership in an ever-evolving space industry.  

 Full programme for the day   https://t.co/j24UXsuhAs

JAXA is participating #IAC2024! Please visit ES-E05. On Day 2, well have lectures regarding SLIM and presentations by private companies. https://t.co/d9vEIvv1Dr

Behold: a full moon worthy of the Halloween season. The Hunters Moon!

According to the Farmers Almanac, this months full moon coincides with deer hunting season. Keep an eye on the sky for the next couple days, as the Moon will appear full through Friday morning. https://t.co/6CfDPDYFBB

Were going on a 1.8-billion-mile journey to an ocean world  Jupiter moon, Europa!
 
@EuropaClipper is set to launch on Monday, Oct. 14, on a @SpaceX Falcon Heavy rocket at 12:06pm ET (1606 UTC) from @NASAKennedy. Use #AskNASA to send us your questions. https://t.co/o3xgleA6Z3
